sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom";
import {
    Edit,
    Add,
    List,
    FindById,
    ListAllGames,
    ListGamesById,
} from "../Category/index";
import { Login } from "../User/index";
import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css";

function App() {
    return ( <
        div >
        <
        nav className = "navbar navbar-expand navbar-dark bg-dark" >
        <
        Link className = "navbar-brand"
        to = { "/user" } >
        Login <
        /Link> <
        div className = "navbar-nav mr-auto" >
        <
        li className = "nav-item" >
        <
        Link to = { Login() ? "/category" : "#" }
        className = "nav-link" >
        Jogos por Nome da Categoria <
        /Link> <
        /li> <
        li className = "nav-item" >
        <
        Link to = { "/gameId" }
        className = "nav-link" >
        Procurar Jogo por ID da Categoria <
        /Link> <
        /li> <
        li className = "nav-item" >
        <
        Link to = { "/add" }
        className = "nav-link" >
        Adicionar categoria <
        /Link> <
        /li>

        <
        li className = "nav-item" >
        <
        Link to = { "/games/all" }
        className = "nav-link" >
        Listar todos os Jogos <
        /Link> <
        /li>

        <
        li className = "nav-item" >
        <
        Link to = { "/games/id" }
        className = "nav-link" >
        Listar todos Jogos po ID <
        /Link> <
        /li> <
        /div> <
        /nav>

        <
        div className = "container mt-3" >
        <
        Switch >
        <
        Route exact path = {
            ["/", "/user"] }
        component = { Login }
        /> <
        Route exact path = { "/category" }
        component = { List }
        /> <
        Route exact path = "/gameId"
        component = { FindById }
        /> <
        Route exact path = "/add"
        component = { Add }
        /> <
        Route path = "/category/:id"
        component = { Edit }
        /> <
        Route path = "/games/id"
        component = { ListGamesById }
        /> <
        Route path = "/games/all"
        component = { ListAllGames }
        /> <
        /Switch> <
        /div> <
        /div>
    );
}

export default App;
